definition: to lose sth abstract but important (courage, authority, one's life etc)/to be bereaved of (one's spouse etc)/to die/disappointed/discouraged

sentences.english: "Wu-er" is a pipe musical instrument of the Wa nationality used at the funerals.
sentences.chinese: “兀兒”是佤族在喪葬儀式中使用的一種吹管樂器。

sentences.english: This article introduced the Monggol nationality funeral etiquette custom of Shan Dong Yan City.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了山東鄄城蒙古族的喪葬禮儀習俗。

sentences.english: To work with pertinent institutions to prepare funerals for deceased retired cadres and take charge of cadres' posthumous affairs.
sentences.chinese: 會同有關部門辦理離退休幹部的喪葬和善後處理事宜。

sentences.english: Singing the mourning songs is a custom and a ceremony in our country folk funeral activities.
sentences.chinese: 孝歌是我國民間喪葬活動中的一種習俗，一種儀式歌。

sentences.english: There are specific cultural values in Bouyei's funeral ballad of Luoping County.
sentences.chinese: 羅平布依族喪葬歌謠具有特定的文化價值。

sentences.english: One of the purposes of funeral customs is the expression of love.
sentences.chinese: 喪葬禮俗其實質之一就是人類對於愛的潛在表達。

sentences.english: Students of funeral service and mortuary science programs prepare for careers as funeral directors and morticians.
sentences.chinese: 這個專業的學生將來從事喪葬承辦人和殯儀業者。

sentences.english: Death industry reaps grim profit as Japan dies.
sentences.chinese: 日本喪葬業繁榮或成“死亡國度”。

sentences.english: Where a death is caused, damages for the death and funeral must also be paid.
sentences.chinese: 造成死亡的，還應當賠償喪葬費和死亡賠償金。

sentences.english: Planning is under way to minimise delays in burials and cremations.
sentences.chinese: 減少喪葬和火化延遲方面的計劃將緊隨其後。

sentences.english: Thee origin of Chinese steles is closely related to the burial system.
sentences.chinese: 中國石碑的起源卻和喪葬制度有着密切的關係。

sentences.english: The funerals in the regions of Tujia Nationality are often accompanied with drum music and dance.
sentences.chinese: 土家族地區的喪葬習俗，常和鼓樂同在，與歌舞同存。

sentences.english: Fen Jin Qu" is a popular funeral song in Qiandongnan."
sentences.chinese: 《焚巾曲》是流傳於黔東南巴拉河兩岸的喪葬風俗歌。

sentences.english: The haircut system of a hundred day is the traditional funeral custom of Manchu .
sentences.chinese: 百日剃髮是滿族的傳統喪葬習俗。

sentences.english: Retirement and funeral expenses are also covered.
sentences.chinese: 退休費及喪葬費用也包含其中。

sentences.english: "Husband and wife sharing the grave" was a vastly prevailing funeral custom in the Tang society.
sentences.chinese: “夫妻合葬”是唐代社會一種廣爲流行的喪葬習俗。

definition: passed on from generation to generation (idiom); to hand down
Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)/refers to the Western Han and Eastern Han
current politics/political situation of the time
